---
title: "ImmuneAge coefficients (ET13)"
format:
  html:
    toc: true
---

Extended Data Table 13 provides ImmuneAge coefficients (see [ImmuneAge training](ImmuneAge_all.qmd).

```{r}
library(here)
here::i_am('et13.qmd')
load("out/ImmAge_gen_coef.Rdata")
load("src/vars.Rdata")

coef <- ImmAge_gen_coef |> dplyr::left_join(vars, by = c("name" = 'x')) |> 
  dplyr::select(assay, label, s1, antibodies ) |> 
  dplyr::rename(name = label,
                weight = s1)

writexl::write_xlsx(coef, path = here("out/Extended-Data-Table-13.xlsx"))
```

```{r}
DT::datatable(coef)

```
